channel.title: CVE Feed for HackerOne -- html-pages
channel.description: The latest CVEs for HackerOne -- html-pages

item.title: CVE-2018-16481|2024-08-05T10:24:32.672Z -- hackerone -- html-pages
item.description: A XSS vulnerability was found in html-page <=2.1.1 that allows malicious Javascript code to be executed in the user's browser due to the absence of sanitization of the paths before rendering.
